channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Democrats Should Follow the Seinfeld Principle
item.description: They have fallen into the profanity trap.

item.title: Trump Admin Poised To Ditch Biden-Era Taxpayer-Funded Abortion For Veterans
item.description: The Trump administration advanced its goal to eliminate taxpayer-funded abortion this week when it proposed ditching a Biden administration-era rule t...

item.title: Gallup poll finds record partisan gulf in approval ratings for Congress, Supreme Court
item.description: A Gallup poll released Thursday found record-high party gaps in approval ratings for Congress and the Supreme Court, with the latter suffering its low...

item.title: Trump orders work on new census that will not include those in U.S. illegally
item.description: President Trump announced Thursday that he has ordered the Department of Commerce to create a census that will exclude anyone illegally in the U.S.

item.title: Corporations Have a Responsibility to Not Fleece Taxpayers
item.description: In conversations about corporate social responsibility, cronyism is often left out. It shouldn’t be.

item.title: RFK Jr.’s Unjustified Blow to mRNA Vaccines
item.description: The real threat to this revolutionary medical technology is not $500 million in grant cuts but the possibility of new regulatory barriers.

item.title: Don’t Abandon mRNA
item.description: Along with other actions, RFK’s move on mRNA paints a portrait of a longtime vaccine skeptic pursuing exactly the agenda he said he would.

item.title: Defiant Arizona Lawmaker Could Face Charges After Tipping Off Illegals To ICE Presence
item.description: State Sen. Analise Ortiz, a Phoenix Dem, admits she 'shared information about ICE' — an act that a DHS official says 'looks like obstruction.'

item.title: The Trump IRS and the GOP Congress Should Make Taxes Easy Again
item.description: There’s plenty that new IRS Commissioner Billy Long can do to make the tax system easier for people to manage.

item.title: Trump's broad tariffs go into effect, just as economic pain is surfacing
item.description: President Trump began levying higher import taxes on dozens of countries Thursday, just as the economic fallout of his monthslong tariff threats has b...

item.title: Rep. Cory Mills hit with revenge-porn accusation after breakup with beauty queen
item.description: Rep. Cory Mills has been accused of threatening to release sexually intimate images and videos of his ex-girlfriend, according to a police report.

item.title: David French’s Lazy Lies About Russiagate Docs Show He Has No Idea What He’s Talking About
item.description: Members of the propaganda press like David French are scrambling to peddle ignorant and disprovable lies about the damning Russiagate documents that w...

item.title: Harvard Continues Race-Based Admissions Even After SCOTUS Affirmative Action Decision: Complaint
item.description: Harvard signaled it would find a way to bypass the Supreme Court's decision within hours after it came down in 2023.

item.title: Cracker Barrel Is Another Regional Hallmark That’s Fallen Victim To Monocultural Carpetbaggers
item.description: Cracker Barrel's soulless remodeling push wipes away the nostalgic charm that makes the restaurant chain special.

item.title: Trump takes jabs at Colbert, Fallon, Kimmel and Stern over future of talk shows
item.description: President Trump took a swing Wednesday at hostile late-night television and talk radio hosts whose programs are on the line or are about to be cancell...
